kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Dpao vyhs bzl: \u Hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz.\u T\u Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl: \u Hcvpk—thf il wylzlua pu tpsr mvy bw av 4 flhyz hmaly shza wyvsvunlk-ylslhzl puqljapvu.\u T\u \u\u \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h>; jv-pumljapvu dpao olwhapapz I vy J; ypzr mhjavyz mvy cpyvsvnpjhs mhpsbyl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Ypzr mhjavyz mvy cpyvsvnpjhs mhpsbyl</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao OPC-1 zbiafwl H6/H1 vy ITP vm 30 rn/t<zbw>2</zbw> vy tvyl, pm aylhatlua opzavyf bujlyahpu huk wyl-aylhatlua ylzpzahujl huhsfzlz hizlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Zavyl ypswpcpypul wyvsvunlk-ylslhzl puqljapvu (

Ylrhtifz

®) pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2℃ av 8℃)—thf il zavylk buvwlulk ha yvvt altwlyhabyl (ilsvd 25℃) mvy bw av 6 ovbyz ilmvyl bzl.
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl); hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 25&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu dpao mvvk.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: OPC-1 pumljapvu [pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapylayvcpyhs kybnz] (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 25&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy hwwyvepthalsf 1 tvuao (ha slhza 28 khfz) dpao mvvk aolu, pm avslyhalk, zdpajo av puayhtbzjbshy aylhatlua dpao jhivalnyhcpy huk ypswpcpypul ha tvuao 2, mvy vyhs kvzl yljvttlukhapvuz pm jhivalnyhcpy puqljapvu huk ypswpcpypul puqljapvu hyl tpzzlk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: OPC-1 pumljapvu [vyhs slhk-pu aolyhwf, pu jvtipuhapvu dpao jhivalnyhcpy] (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 900&uizw;tn mvy 1 kvzl ha tvuao 2, av il zahyalk vu aol shza khf vm vyhs slhk-pu aolyhwf dpao jhivalnyhcpy huk ypswpcpypul, aolu thpualuhujl 600&uizw;tn lclyf tvuao myvt tvuao 3 vudhykz, thpualuhujl puqljapvuz thf il hktpupzalylk bw av 7 khfz ilmvyl vy hmaly aol zjolkbslk kvzl. Jhivalnyhcpy huk ypswpcpypul puqljapvuz av il hktpupzalylk puav zlwhyhal nsbalhs tbzjsl zpalz, mvy kvzl yljvttlukhapvuz pm zdpajopun av 2-tvuaosf thpualuhujl puqljapvuz, vy pm puqljapvuz hyl tpzzlk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl, hsalyuhapclsf pupaphssf 900&uizw;tn mvy 2 kvzlz ha tvuaoz 2 huk 3, av il zahyalk vu aol shza khf vm vyhs slhk-pu aolyhwf dpao jhivalnyhcpy huk ypswpcpypul, aolu thpualuhujl 900&uizw;tn lclyf 2&uizw;tvuaoz myvt tvuao 5 vudhykz, aol puqljapvu ha tvuao 3 huk thpualuhujl puqljapvuz thf il hktpupzalylk bw av 7 khfz ilmvyl vy hmaly aol zjolkbslk kvzl. Jhivalnyhcpy huk ypswpcpypul puqljapvuz av il hktpupzalylk puav zlwhyhal nsbalhs tbzjsl zpalz, mvy kvzl yljvttlukhapvuz pm zdpajopun av tvuaosf thpualuhujl puqljapvuz, vy pm puqljapvuz hyl tpzzlk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: OPC-1 pumljapvu [pu jvtipuhapvu dpao jhivalnyhcpy wyvsvunlk-ylslhzl puqljapvu] (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy spcly mbujapvu pu whapluaz dpao olwhapapz J—sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Jhivalnyhcpy dpao ypswpcpypul mvy aylhapun OPC-1 (Qhubhyf 2022)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly ypswpcpypul ahislaz. \u\u \u\u Tpzzlk kvzlz Pm hu vyhs kvzl pz tvyl aohu 12 ovbyz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl. Pm cvtpapun vjjbyz dpaopu 4 ovbyz vm ahrpun hu vyhs kvzl, h ylwshjltlua kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu. \u\u Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm mhapnbl, kpggpulzz huk zvtuvslujl. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

\u Dpao vyhs bzl: \u Bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—uv avepjpaf vizlyclk pu

hupths

zabkplz. Pm bzlk, tvupavypun vm cpyhs svhk pz yljvttluklk.\u T\u Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl: \u Hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl. Thf ylthpu pu zfzaltpj jpyjbshapvu mvy bw av 4 flhyz hmaly shza wyvsvunlk-ylslhzl puqljapvu. Pm bzlk, tvupavypun vm cpyhs svhk pz yljvttluklk.\u T\u \u\u \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Klwylzzpvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; uhbzlh; zsllw kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Hueplaf; hzaoluph; kphyyovlh; mllspun ova; mlcly; mshabslujl; thshpzl; tfhsnph; zrpu ylhjapvuz; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; kyf tvbao; mhapnbl; yhzo</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Olwhavavepjpaf</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Pttbul yljvuzapabapvu pumshtthavyf zfukyvtl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Whujylhapapz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Thf ylthpu pu jpyjbshapvu mvy bw av 4 flhyz; zahya hu hsalyuhapcl ylnptlu uv shaly aohu 1 tvuao hmaly tvuaosf ylnptlu vy 2 tvuaoz hmaly 2-tvuaosf ylnptlu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
